nodes.text: Dana "Deke" Galvason was a female tramp freighter captain from Bakura who had what some would consider a "devil-may-care" attitude towards her work.

A brash woman, she was among the select few who were allowed to travel through the Deep Core Security Zone and make cargo runs to the planet of Byss. Although she was paid well by the Galactic Empire for her work, she was as likely to run from the Imperial Starfleet as she was to work for it, and was not above smuggling for the Rebel Alliance as long as she could get away with it and was well compensated for her trouble.
Her personal starship was the CEC YT-2000 light freighter Bakuran Blade.
